app.name: Train Crisis HD
app.description: What an amazing and challenging game! Connecting train tracks let the train to pass.

app.name: Sudoku 5000+ puzzles
app.description: Pure and simple Sudoku Game. More than 5000+ sudoku puzzles. Divided into 6 level(Easy,Hard,Very Hard,Extreme,Nightmare),There are also 4 categories(Snowflake puzzles, Learning Curve, No Trick ,Superiors).

app.name: MobPDF:PDF Annotator Reader
app.description: MobPDF: small and fast PDF,XPS,CBZ viewer, annotator, form filler, printing.Supports PDF with transparency, encryption, hyperlinks, annotations, searching and more.

app.name: Media Player HD Video Player
app.description: HD Video Player and Music Player.Supported 200+ Video and Audio Formats

app.name: Easy Reader - EBook Reader
app.description: EBook Reader.Supports: epub (non-DRM), fb2, doc, txt, rtf, html, chm, tcr, pdb, prc, mobi (non-DRM), pml.

app.name: Battery Info - Battery Doctor
app.description: Battery Info is the original battery indicator app for Android.

app.name: WIFI Tether Plus : Network Sharing
app.description: Better WiFi Tethering App , share your network.

app.name: Bible Reader - HOLY BIBLE SET
app.description: Bible Reader : Simple ,Fast BIBLE APP. Supports many kinds of Bible versions.

app.name: Music Editor and Ringtone Editor
app.description: Easy to edit music and make Ringtone!
